title: Hot or cold, rural residents more vulnerable to extreme temperatures

title_detail.value: Hot or cold, rural residents more vulnerable to extreme temperatures

summary: A study in China's Zheijiang Province shows that people in China's rural communities are more vulnerable to both hot and cold temperature extremes than people living in urban areas.

summary_detail.value: A study in China's Zheijiang Province shows that people in China's rural communities are more vulnerable to both hot and cold temperature extremes than people living in urban areas.
